dict.string: Personalize each bookshelf to your child's interests and abilities to ensure age-and-level appropriate reading.
Storia eBooks for younger readers feature read-alouds designed to make reading fun. These eBooks include lively music, sound effects, and highlighted text.
The Storia Dictionary helps younger children understand words without interrupting the story. Highlight a word and the dictionary offers age-appropriate definitions.
The Storia Dictionary for Older Children aids in pronunciation resulting in improved reading comprehension and retention.
Storia's select Enriched eBooks offer fun learning activities — including games, word matches and quizzes.
Fun games help build comprehension, retention and reading confidence.
Your older child can highlight text to revisit, just like in a paper book.
Storia's note-taking feature also allows them to jot down their thoughts and have their notes saved to the eBook they're reading.
Storia’s Reading Reports allow you to follow your child’s reading habits and interests by keeping track of the titles they’ve read and their time spent with each eBook.
Keep reading confidence growing with eBook recommendations from the reading experts at Scholastic. Your child will be able to add eBooks to a wish list so you can keep them excited about reading.
Register now to get started! After you sign in, your five FREE eBooks will be waiting for you. Just assign your new eBooks to a child's bookshelf so they can start reading.
